#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType Length.

== Name ==

*[SLength Length]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
double
  |
  +--Length (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Length of an object. Limited to 1000 units of length.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	inclusive lower bound: 0inclusive upper bound: 1000

----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CLengthWithUnits LengthWithUnits]
----
    <xs:simpleType name="Length">  <xs:restriction base="xs:double">    <xs:minInclusive value="0"/>    <xs:maxInclusive value="1000"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
